transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Sir, ye JBM International se baat ho rahi hai?
Executive: Haan ji sir.
Executive: Good evening sir, main Taufiq baat kar raha tha senior manager IndiaMART se, kaise hain aap?
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Executive: Ji abhi sir aapke paas ek WhatsApp pe feedback gaya hoga, hamari Komal hamare side se aapne call kiya wo Komal ne aapko call kiya hoga. To
Executive: WhatsApp pe feedback jata hai. To usme sir aapne not satisfied mark kiya tha, uske regarding hi sir maine aapko connect karaya hai sir. Matlab kya issue aa raha hai sir?
Customer: Sir abhi main aapko aapse kal connect kar sakta hu abhi?
Executive: Ji?
Customer: Aapse main kal connect kar sakta hu?
Executive: Haan haan bilkul. Aap bataiye kal kis time main connect kar lu aapko?
Customer: Around one.
Executive: One.
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Alright alright. Main connect karta hu aapko kal 1:00 pm pe.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Thank you so much for your time sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer marked 'not satisfied' in feedback form.

Resolution:

- Executive called to inquire about the issue.
- Agreed to connect next day to discuss the issue.

Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer next day at 1:00 PM.

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- feedback, follow up, connect
